ygData.subject: Re: Possible quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... In beta there was a broken flute quest that involved that same guy. As well as a horn quest too.  The FedEx quest are not bad, I did the
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Dudley Stewart <dud@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Possible quest
>Date: Wed, 30 Jun 1999 19:13:49 -0400
>
>From: Dudley Stewart <dud@...>
>
>When I listed the Bard quests I knew about (before this latest patch), I
>neglected to mention one which is a mystery to me...
>
>If you talk to the fellow in the Bard's Guild in Qeynos that's carrying a
>flute he'll mention how the "collect-the-watch-reports" guy made it for
>him, cuz his father was a master flute craftsman. Now, if you talk to the
>dude outside (watch reports guys) and spend about half an hour trying a
>perplexing array of confusing grammar and hesitant and vague replies you'll
>find out that this guy has stopped making magical flutes.
>
>I got no more out of him, no matter what I tried (about another half an
>hour).
>
>Has anyone gotten further?
>
>It's frustrating that there's this inconsistency in the way quests work -
>you sometimes have to hit them with phrases that aren't in []'s. Not to
>mention the typos, irrelevant gender-specific replies and the lack of
>versatility. I don't mean to go off on a rant here... so I'll just hush up
>now ;)
>
>Dud
>
>P.S. Any juicy loot from these new FedEx quests?
>
In beta there was a broken flute quest that involved that same guy. As well
as a horn quest too. The FedEx quest are not bad, I did the
Qeynos-Highhold-Freeport run on the test server and made 5 to 14 gold per
delivery. Nice stuff for a 5th level bard :)

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server
